segments.text: Mr . Jackson , I've drafted a schedule for your business trip next week . You may have a look .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , great ! Let's discuss it together . Now , when am I off then ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , am I seeing Mr . Li ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , you're seeing him on Thursday . You're inspecting the factory in the morning and having dinner with him in the evening .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that's not everything . You're free on Friday and then on Saturday you're catching the 9 o'clock plane back to Guangzhou .
segments.speaker: S1
